texts.name: Cassandra
texts.biography: Cassandra’s cold and unyielding character comes to light every time she settles her province’s matters as a high judge. Her incorruptible spirit and harsh punishments yielded her the sympathy of Ammuts, ever fond of feasts that each execution brings.

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Ammuts or Devouring Ammuts by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Ammuts
